text: that shouldn’t be happening. can you share the command you are running (in a DM is fine)?

this is expected if the HubSpot portal doesn’t have the beta features enabled. if you haven’t already, sign up at <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvavpvKmkHVllFYZ5lHjADAdH4hbHgnVSmimVekszdOCQiEA/viewform> for the beta. we will be enabling the features for dev sandbox portals soon.
Sorry I was referring to the file manager not the DM. I apologize for the confusion
Ah, that makes sense. I spun up a dev portal and thats where the raw files aren't appearing
just request beta access for the dev portal

Follow up to that though :point_up: <@U38EZFVFE> What happens when we upload assets to the beta DM (once enabled)? are they accessible like normal FM assets? asking on behalf of my marketers who just scroll through images and pick one already in HubSpot.
it would be amazing to sync a bunch of asset folders to get creative assets into HubSpot with the local-dev tooling
for now I am trying to get some gulp-ftp scripting running which has it's own issues
Honestly that is all unexplored territory seeing that it isnt even available yet. <@U22VBL87M> might could shed light
I love being on the frontier...
